contact_us_success_message: Thank you. Your message has been sent.
contact_us_error_message: Sorry, there was an issue sending your message. Please try again later.
contact_us_mail_service_unavailable: Sorry, the mail service is currently unavailable. Please email us manually.
validation_error_name_length: Name must be at most 50 characters.
validation_error_subject_length: Subject must be between 5 and 100 characters.
validation_error_message_invalid_type: Message content must be a string.
validation_error_message_length: Message content must be between 10 and 2000 characters.
referrer_validation_error: This request must come from an approved source.
